name: Do Haniwa Dream of Ceramic Sheep?
name_original: Do Haniwa Dream of Ceramic Sheep?
description:
Oh no, you are stuck in Mayumi's dream!

 
With the help of the Dream World's ruler, Doremy Sweet, help Mayumi out by guiding the ceramic sheep safely towards her so our Haniwa friend can sleep soundly. 

Control:

Left Mouse: Sheep Jump

Right Mouse: Sheep Turn

Click and drag specific platform to move.

The team:

CKenshin: https://twitter.com/Ckenshin7 (Discord: CKenshin#2026)

Kiroko: (Discord: Kiroko, Lunar Tear Aficionado#8231)

Note: Click outside of "Ready?" to continue.
